title: Vietnam Veterans Memorial: Park Home
body: The Wall That Heals  Honoring the men and women who served in the controversial Vietnam War, the Vietnam Veterans Memorial chronologically lists the names of more than 58,000 Americans who gave their lives in service to their country. Read More             Find a Name   Use the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Fund database.            Plan Your Visit   Nothing compares to the experience of seeing it for yourself.        Volunteer   Volunteers help visitors and provide vital support to the park's mission.
